articles.title: Silvio Berlusconi: former Italian prime minister has died at 86 - Reuters
articles.description: Silvio Berlusconi, the billionaire media mogul and former Italian prime minister who transformed the nation's politics with polarising policies and often alarmed…
articles.content: MILAN, June 12 (Reuters) - Silvio Berlusconi, the billionaire media mogul and former Italian prime minister who transformed the nation's politics with polarising policies and often alarmed his allies… [+4763 chars]
